title: 我的世界服务器红石经常失灵红石不亮
author: 阿奇!
txt_content: LagAssist 用的这个优化插件 红石经常就停了 请问一下大佬们是什么原因 拉杆也不能用 红石也不亮

replies.author: 深拥v
replies.txt_content:
/laggassist
点两下那个红石块
（其实就是你服务器太卡了，升配置吧）
或者把这个插件tps检测阈值调低到15左右
还不行就删了看看= =

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
LagAssist\server.yml

redstone-culler:
  breaker: true
设置成false试试

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-5-15 22:29
LagAssist\server.yml

redstone-culler:deny-physics:
  # Should we disable physics just as the server starts?
  # TIP: It can be used to modify gameplay features.
  # For example, you can disable decay, fire & melting for a build server.
  enabled: false
  # Automatic Physics disabler will occur if tps is under this value.
  # EG: If tps is under 16, lagassist will disable the physics that are
  # TIP: Set to 0.0 to disable it.
  maxtps: 17.0
  # What should we disable? Please make sure this fits your game perfectly. If you have a cannoning server,
  # disabling explosions would be useless. At the same time, you shouldn't enable them for a survival server.
  systems:
    explosions: true
    grassspread: true
    melting: true
    pistons: true
    fire: true
    liquidspread: true
    decay: true
    redstone: true
    # Had reports of noteblock & observer machines to lag the server significantly
    noteblock: true复制代码

这个里面的 redstone 也是为 false 应该可以解决问题

replies.author: 阿奇!
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-5-15 22:30
这个里面的 redstone 也是为 false 应该可以解决问题
这个改成False了还是停 忘记补充了 红石停的时候 水岩浆流动也停了
